Sentencas: In reversible solid oxide cell (rSOC)-based renewable microgrids connected to the network, control logic optimizing the power split with the grid is needed.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: The benefits associated with such configuration are assessed and compared to an islanded reversible microgrid, previously designed via a model-based approach.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: Multiple loads are met, including those of a residential complex as well as electric and fuel cell vehicle fleets.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: The energy storage system consists of a rSOC and hydrogen and thermal storage tanks.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: The targeted optimal power split annual trajectory is found through dynamic programming.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: Suitable simplifying assumptions are introduced to develop a fast reduced-order sub-model from the original islanded rSOC microgrid, thus conceiving the optimal control problem as a one state dynamic programming task.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: Due to the connection to the grid, the energy storage system no longer has to compensate for the difference between generation and demand, thus enabling economic rSOC sub scaling.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: Finding the best control strategy and resizing jointly lead to capital and operating expense reductions.
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids

Sentencas: The optimization outcomes indicate how a 60% reduction in rSOC nominal power allows for a simple payback period of 40% less than for the islanded design, as well as for proper rSOC capacity exploitation. ?
Titulo: On the use of dynamic programming for optimal energy management of grid-connected reversible solid oxide cell-based renewable microgrids
